name: Horde Survivors (daneren2005)
description:
Horde Survivors is a time survival game with rougelite gameplay.  See how long you can survive each round, gaining gold you can use to purchase powerups to make you more powerful in your next run.  Unlock achievements to gain access to additional weapons, abilities, and characters.  Mouse, keyboard, and touchscreens are all supported.  Currently some iPhones crash during load.

In the Works:

  • More weapons/characters
  • Mid-game and end-game events
  • Various quality of life improvements
